statements: SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT id, name FROM artists ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE website_url IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, website_url FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, genre FROM artists WHERE website_url IS NOT NULL ORDER BY genre ASC, name DESC;
SELECT id, name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre IN ('Hip-Hop', 'R&B') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE name LIKE 'J%' AND website_url LIKE '%.com' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT name, genre FROM artists WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT artist_id, name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT * FROM concerts WHERE venue = 'Madison Square Garden';
SELECT performer_id, date, venue FROM concerts ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM artists WHERE genre='Rock'
SELECT name, genre FROM artists ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, venue, date FROM concerts WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC
SELECT artist_id, name, genre FROM artists JOIN concerts ON artists.artist_id = concerts.performer_id WHERE venue='Madison Square Garden'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalArtists FROM artists
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT band_name, genre FROM bands;
SELECT concert_name, date, location FROM concerts;
SELECT artist_id, artist_name FROM artists WHERE artist_id = 1;
SELECT band_name, genre FROM bands WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT artist_name FROM artists;
SELECT band_name, genre FROM bands WHERE genre = 'Rock';
SELECT concert_name, location, date FROM concerts WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM artists JOIN concerts ON artists.artist_id = concerts.artist_band_id WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT band_name, count(concert_id) as num_concerts FROM bands JOIN concerts ON bands.band_id = concerts.artist_band_id GROUP BY band_name;
SELECT * FROM Artists;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM Bands;
SELECT concert_name, location, date FROM Concerts;
SELECT artist_id, band_id, concert_id FROM ConcertPerformances;
SELECT artist_name, band_name, concert_name, location, date FROM Artists JOIN Bands ON Artists.artist_id = Bands.band_id JOIN Concerts ON Artists.artist_id = Concerts.concert_id;
SELECT * FROM Artists;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM Artists WHERE genre='Pop';
SELECT concert_name, location, date FROM Concerts ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT Artists.artist_name, Bands.band_name, Concerts.concert_name FROM ConcertPerformances JOIN Artists ON ConcertPerformances.artist_id = Artists.artist_id JOIN Bands ON ConcertPerformances.band_id = Bands.band_id JOIN Concerts ON ConcertPerformances.concert_id = Concerts.concert_id;

SELECT Concerts.concert_name, Artists.artist_name, Bands.band_name FROM ConcertPerformances JOIN Artists ON ConcertPerformances.artist_id = Artists.artist_id JOIN Bands ON ConcertPerformances.band_id = Bands.band_id JOIN Concerts ON ConcertPerformances.concert_id = Concerts.concert_id WHERE Concerts.date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT * FROM artists;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE debut_year < 2010;
SELECT band_name, formed_year FROM bands ORDER BY formed_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM concerts WHERE date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT artist_name, concert_name, performance_time FROM artists JOIN artist_in_concert ON artists.artist_id = artist_in_concert.artist_id JOIN concerts ON artist_in_concert.concert_id = concerts.concert_id;
SELECT * FROM artists ORDER BY artist_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM artists WHERE genre='Rock' ORDER BY debut_year ASC
SELECT band_name, formed_year FROM bands WHERE genre='Pop'
SELECT concert_name, venue, date FROM concerts WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT artist_name, genre, debut_year FROM artists JOIN artist_in_concert ON artists.artist_id = artist_in_concert.artist_id
